directions: Mix creamy salad dressing, mustard, sugar, and vinegar together with a whisk in a large bowl; add egg slices and gently stir to coat.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes.
ingredients: 2 1/2 cups creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
12 hard-boiled eggs, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch slices
title: Creamy Deviled Egg Salad
